pages.text: The Straddler is a hostile mob that likes to live in the Basalt Delta biome. It will use $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/stradpole)Stradpole$(/l) as projectiles.$(br2)It will do anything to stay far away from the player, you will notice that it is a fast mob.$(br2)On death, Straddler may drop Basalt and sometimes Straddlite.
Straddlite can be crafted to make Straddleboards, allow you to surf on lava.
